title: Daily Creation
prompt: A massive monolithic obsidian spire fracturing and shattering into thousands of perfect geometric cubes, frozen in mid-air. The composition features sharp monochrome edges with digital scanlines and displacement glitches. Stark white (#FFFFFF) light pierces through deep black (#1A1A1A) voids, creating high-contrast shadows. Razor-sharp focus on the cubic fragments, black and white geometric abstraction, 8k, raytraced reflections on polished surfaces, cinematic glitch aesthetics.
